    • Uses of MicroserviceError in org.pipservices.runtime.errors

      Subclasses of MicroserviceError in org.pipservices.runtime.errors 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BadRequestError
      Errors due to improper user requests, like missing or wrong parameters
      class  BuildError
      Errors happened during microservice build process and caused by problems in component factories
      class  CallError
      Errors returned by remote services or network during call attempts
      class  ConfigError
      Errors related to mistakes in microservice user-defined configuration
      class  ConflictError
      Errors raised by conflict in object versions posted by user and stored on server.
      class  ConnectionError
      Errors happened during connection to remote services.
      class  FileError
      Errors in read/write file operations
      class  NotFoundError
      Error caused by attempt to access missing object
      class  StateError
      Errors related to operations called in wrong component state.
      class  UnauthorizedError
      Access errors caused by missing user identity or security permissions
      class  UnknownError
      Internal errors caused by programming or unexpected errors
      class  UnsupportedError
      Errors caused by calls to unsupported or not yet implemented functionality
